title: Bloomberg's Hammond on Praxair, Wayne on Trump's Bad Deals(Aud)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Hammond on Praxair, Wayne on Trump's Bad Deals(Aud)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUESTS: Ed Hammond, Deals Reporter for Bloomberg News, on Praxair Inc. and Linde AG holding talks to combine, in a deal that could create the largest supplier of industrial gases. Alex Wayne, White House Editor for Bloomberg, highlights political news: Trump's deal style may sour foreign policy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
